org.dotplot.image
Class JAITools

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.image.JAITools
public final class JAITools
extends java.lang.Object

Class containing several tools handling images through JAI (imaging) and iText (PDF).

Method Detail

aggregateImages

public static java.io.File aggregateImages(java.util.Map indexedImages,
                                           java.awt.Dimension size)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Aggregates/Combines the images given by indexedImages. The size must be the correct size of the target image.

Parameters:
indexedImages - of the clients to their corresponding image part
size - the target size of the complete image
Returns:
a File, the target image has been saved to. It will be deleted on exit.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs
